errorComponent.description: Custom component for error message. Use only if you need to set custom component for specific control. To specify custom component for all form errors use BB_DYNAMIC_ERROR_TMPL InjectionToken.

errorLabels.description: Custom error labels object. Use only if you need to set custom error labels for specific control. To specify custom error labels for entire form use BB_VALIDATION_ERRORS InjectionToken.

inputSelector.description: Selector to indicate the control in which aria-describedby should be set.

showError.description: Custom function to specify when errors should be shown. By default will be shown when control is invalid.
